item.title: Delta plane crash investigators piece together Toronto Airport incident
item.description: Investigators probing Monday's Delta plane crash at Toronto Pearson International Airport are piecing together what caused the dramatic incident.

item.title: US and Russia begin high-stakes talks over Ukraine's fate
item.description: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was not invited to participate.

item.title: Dozens of recruits have died nationwide while training to become police officers
item.description: At least 29 recruits have died during basic training at law enforcement academies nationwide in the last decade

item.title: WATCH: 2nd 'Slender Man stabbing' assailant Morgan Geyser granted conditional release
